Ok, I also had some problems at first with getting the CD key to work.  Try entering the CD Key, then pressing enter.  Also, try making all the letters in uppercase or lowercase.

Sorry, bad news for everyone who missed out.  This was a momentary exploit in Fileplanet where you could get a beta key with a free account instead of having to use a payed one.  People who got it in time got it, people who didn't are outa luck.
Is this the hole game?
is it the hole game?

yea the exploit was good for like 12hrs or so where free accs can gain a key.. if you missed it oh well, play with yourself


@jonlfc
no its not the whole game, like jaf said

"and follow the instructions and open ur eyes^^"

the title states MP-beta and its only 445mb you really think its the whole game?? think again..

The game runs fine, but I can't even create a server to mess around with or play on LAN. I get an invalid CD-Key error no matter what. Is there any way to work around this? It's no longer possible to get CD-Keys from fileplanet.
I was able to get in-game by using the Stalker MP DS shortcut. You can only mess around with it though, I doubt LAN will work.
Hideaki: Got same problems myself, but I heard there will be a public beta out someday next week so you don't have to delete it.

The Beta looks good, I like the lightning effects.
Now I'm gonna echo the words of others here, I've tried editing the file in relation to the cd key but still I get an error no cd key, So LAN looks out for me, Hideaki is correct the only way in is through the DS shortcut, Anyway nice preview
Cheers
